main.name: Amrutha Adiyath
main.description: I'm a programmer who loves what I do! With {{EXPERIENCE}} years of experience, I take pride in writing quality code. I have skills in front-end, back-end, and database development.
main.bio: Hey there! I’m Amrutha Adiyath, and I’m enjoying life in Moose Jaw, Saskatchewan. I've spent {{EXPERIENCE}} years programming, working with front-end and back-end technologies like ReactJS, Java, Python, and PostgreSQL. There are many other technologies I have learned and used as per project needs, so I am open to any technology stacks
main.bio_p: When I'm not coding, I'm spending time with my family which includes my 5 cats and my husband. Front-end dev is something that I enjoy, so I make pure JS/CSS components for fun! I'm also a big animal lover, rescuing and fostering cats (even the grumpy ones!).

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the skills I’m good at:

education.degree: Post Graduate Diploma in Technology Management
education.description: This program sharpened my Java, Python, and SQL Server skills for project development. I learned about network management, PowerBI, and Agile project management, along with business strategies like ITIL and data privacy.

education.degree: Bachelor's in Technology (Computer Science and Engineering)
education.description: This is where I got formal knowledge on data structures, algorithms, and complexities. My love for web development started here, I made many personal as well as freelance websites which eventually got me an internship while I was still pursuing my bachelors.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: I teamed up with the owner and main developer, helping out with the development and maintenance of his PHP-based applications.

work.title: Store Associate
work.description: I assisted customers in finding what they needed and ensured their orders were processed smoothly. Building great relationships with customers is something I excel in, making sure they leave happy.

work.title: Full-Stack Developer
work.description: I started my journey in front-end development with ReactJS and then switched to back-end work with Java, Python, and NodeJS. My projects included crafting front-end solutions, backend batch or order systems, and database designs. I have handled large databases that receive a high volume of queries and made them more efficient by analyzing and optimizing the queries, indexing or partitioning tables, and caching.

work.title: Developer Intern
work.description: I got to learn the ropes in front-end tech, working on converting wireframes into actual web pages.

volunteer.description: I’m helping out with SCRAPS, rescuing and fostering cats that need a bit of extra love. It’s all about giving them a cozy home, socializing them, and finding their forever families.

I volunteered with PAWS Thrissur to rescue and foster stray cats, giving them care, attention, and a safe space until they found their new homes. I also helped spread the word about animal welfare around town.

certifications.name: IELTS
certifications.description: Certified my English skills with an overall band score of 8, and 8.5 in speaking.
